name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Caesar Clown's laboratory on Punk Hazard where he conducts illegal weapons experiments and holds kidnapped children. The facility serves as both a research center and a prison for Law and Smoker.

keyEvents.title: Mocha Regains Her Senses in the Lab
keyEvents.description: Mocha begins resisting the addictive drug and remembers the Straw Hats' rescue attempt while in the laboratory room.
keyEvents.significance: The lab is where the children are held and drugged, making it the center of Caesar's cruel experiments.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Reveals Heart Swap Deal to Law
keyEvents.description: In the laboratory, Caesar reveals to the captive Law that he holds his heart and has been spying on him through Monet.
keyEvents.significance: The lab serves as Caesar's seat of power where he holds his prisoners and reveals his schemes.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Broadcasts from Lab to Underworld Brokers
keyEvents.description: Caesar uses the laboratory's broadcasting equipment to transmit his weapons demonstration to underworld brokers worldwide.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the lab's role as a center for illegal arms dealing and weapons development for the New World's criminal underworld.

description: A devastated island in the New World split between fire and ice, formerly a government research facility that was destroyed by Caesar's poison gas experiment four years ago. Now serves as Caesar's illegal laboratory.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Explains Punk Hazard's Destruction
keyEvents.description: Caesar reveals that Smiley was created from the H2S poison gas bomb that devastated Punk Hazard four years ago, nearly wiping out all life on the island.
keyEvents.significance: Provides crucial backstory about the island's tragic history and Caesar's role in its destruction.

keyEvents.title: Giant Candy Placed for Smiley on Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: A massive candy containing the Shinokuni substance is placed on the island for Smiley to consume as part of Caesar's broadcast experiment.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the island-wide catastrophe that will force everyone to flee or be petrified by the spreading Shinokuni gas.

keyEvents.title: Smiley Devours the Candy on Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: Smiley consumes the giant candy on the island, triggering the transformation that will threaten all life on Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: Begins the countdown to the Shinokuni disaster that will engulf the entire island.

statusHistory.reason: Island was devastated by Caesar's poison gas experiment four years ago, splitting it between fire and ice after Akainu and Aokiji's battle
